com.conquestrpg.game

Class MapLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.conquestrpg.game.MapLoader

  • public class MapLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    The class MapLoader is used in the RPGame class to load into the game. All TMX files that are loaded must have object layers that include the names: COLLISION_LAYER, NPC_LAYER, ITEM_LAYER, PLAYER_SPAWN_LAYER, and DOORWAY_LAYER. This class also is used to find door overlap if a player steps on a door.
    Version:
    Dec-4-2018
    Author:
    James Lund, Zachary Thomas, Matthew Doan, Aaron Brinkerhoff
